title: Tech Innovation Summit
description: Join industry leaders and innovators for a full-day conference on the latest in AI, blockchain, and cloud computing. Network with startups and investors.

title: City Jazz Festival
description: An evening of smooth and classic jazz performed by international artists. Food trucks and local breweries will be on site.

title: Modern Art Exhibition
description: Explore contemporary art installations and digital experiences from over 50 international artists. Guided tours available.

title: Youth Coding Bootcamp
description: A 2-week intensive coding bootcamp designed for high school students. Learn JavaScript, React, and Next.js with hands-on projects.

title: Championship Soccer Match
